environment.name: Rock
environment.desc: Solid rock. Solid, but can be dug through.

environment.name: Wall
environment.desc: A sturdy wall blocking the path, providing protection and boundaries.

environment.name: StairsUp
environment.desc: Stairs leading upwards to a higher level, offering a way to ascend.

environment.name: StairsDown
environment.desc: Stairs descending to a lower level, providing a path to explore deeper.

environment.name: Door_Open
environment.desc: An open door, allowing easy passage between rooms.

environment.name: Door_Closed
environment.desc: A closed door, blocking the way until it is opened.

environment.name: Bad
environment.desc: A harmful area that can damage or hinder anyone who steps on it.

environment.name: ShallowWater
environment.desc: Shallow water that can be crossed, though it may slow movement.

environment.name: Lava
environment.desc: Molten lava that is extremely dangerous and will cause severe burns.
